remarks: The two definitions ` t* ` and ` t*rec ` of the reflexive, transitive closure coincide if ` R ` is indeed a relation.  (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.)  (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
statement:
drrtrcl2.1 $e |- ( ph -> Rel R ) $.
drrtrcl2.2 $e |- ( ph -> R e. _V ) $.
dfrtrcl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( t* ` R ) = ( t*rec ` R ) ) $.
